content: **yarn requirements ** 4-ply knitting weight acrylic yarn * 6 oz black * 2 oz baby pink * 1 oz grey or white * 1/2 oz orange for each pumpkin * few yards avocado green **other requirements ** * size g hook * 12 inch black chenille stem * two 6 inch pipe cleaners * one 12 inch stick * some straw from a broom * white thread * a 14-1/2 inch x 10 inch piece of black posterboard * dacron batting * tape * glue * a yarn needle direct pdf link http //botherthebirds net/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/scaralee pdf 1 found in the archives here 2 1 http //botherthebirds net/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/scaralee pdf 2 http //web archive org/web/20080124113523/http //www sarahanns com/crochetworks/witch html
